segments.text: I found an apartment to rent .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Where did you find this apartment ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I found it in today ’ s apartment ads .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Really ? I can ’ t believe you actually found an apartment in the ads .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I actually found it in the ads , and it ’ s not too expensive either .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I want to hear more about this apartment .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: All you really need to know is that the apartment looks great .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How much will you have to pay for rent ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Every month I ’ d only have to pay $ 725 .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: For where we live , that is really inexpensive .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I ’ m glad to hear that you finally found an apartment .
segments.speaker: S2
